Interactive maps of mean annual SST (2002-present) from Ultra-high Resolution (MUR) SST Analysis fv04.1, Global, 0.01Â°

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=12}
library(terra)
library(tidyverse)

mur_mean <- rast("/Users/rof011/rOceanData/data/maldives/SST-MUR-annual_mean.tiff")

library(leaflet)

num_colors <- 10  # Adjust the number of colors for granularity
rdbu_palette <- colorNumeric(palette = "RdBu", domain = values(mur_mean), n = num_colors)

# Leaflet Map with Raster Layer

# Leaflet Map with Raster Layer
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  setView(lat = 4.5, lng = 73.5, zoom = 8) %>%
  addProviderTiles('Esri.WorldImagery', group = "Base Map", options=providerTileOptions(maxNativeZoom=18,maxZoom=100)) |>
  addRasterImage(mur_mean,group = "SST", colors = rdbu_palette, opacity = 0.8) %>%
  addLegend(pal = rdbu_palette, values = values(mur_mean), title = "Sea Surface Temperature", opacity = 0.8) |> 
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Base Map"),
    overlayGroups = c("SST"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )
```
